parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>pr </name>=<value> <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>edeneditor</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>SimulWeather seems to be disabled in [[Eden Editor]] and scenario preview.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns if given position is in clouds.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''simulInClouds''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> pos: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> 
* [[Boolean]] -  [[true|True]] if given position is in clouds
* [[Nothing]] - If given arguments are incorrect

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[simulInClouds]] [[getPos]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setSimulWeatherLayers]], [[simulCloudDensity]], [[simulCloudOcclusion]]
</value></part></template></root>
